text: hi I'm Martha Stewart it's January
already and if you're at all like me
you're thinking organization and
cleaning well your timing is perfect
Armand Hammer baking soda and I just
launched a home rescue contest you can
enter for a chance to win a home visit
from me and a cleaning crew together we
will solve your biggest cleaning
dilemmas whether it's a furry pet a
dirty roommate or a husband whose mess
makes you crazy this could be your lucky
day so pick up your phone create a short
video 30 seconds or less telling me
about your cleaning dilemma post your
video on instagram or twitter and don't
forget to use the hashtag rescue me
martha contest you may just win a chance
for a special home rescue the contest
ends on January nineteenth so don't
delay enter now for a full set of rules
visit marthastewart.com / rescue me
Martha good luck everybody
